entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
